name: Shape (itch)
description:
You are reborn from the void.
As your Ego, explore the Maze and take Shape.

Shape is an experimental game about perception and an invitation to introspection.

The player must escape from a maze, with sole ally his shadow.


Features
  • Freedom to Explore At Your Pace
  • Maze Filled With Puzzles and Tricks
  • Conversations With Your Shadow
  • Your Own Shape

Puzzles
Explore and interact with the maze.


Shadow
You are the shadow you cast.
